body_html: Thanks! Yes, I am aware a lot is implemented only in Python, but at some point it needs to be implemented in either C++ or in Java. Imagine it gets implemented in a user-friendly API in C++, what would make you not use JavaCPP? What would still be missing? That's the kind of feedback I'm looking for. :)
body_text:
Thanks! Yes, I am aware a lot is implemented only in Python, but at some
point it needs to be implemented in either C++ or in Java. Imagine it gets
implemented in a user-friendly API in C++, what would make you not use
JavaCPP? What would still be missing? That's the kind of feedback I'm
looking for. :)
body:
Thanks! Yes, I am aware a lot is implemented only in Python, but at some
point it needs to be implemented in either C++ or in Java. Imagine it gets
implemented in a user-friendly API in C++, what would make you not use
JavaCPP? What would still be missing? That's the kind of feedback I'm
looking for. :)
